question: The blue Mormon, a large swallowtail butterfly, has been declared as the “State butterfly” of which state?
explanation: The blue Mormon is a large swallowtail butterfly has been declared as the “State butterfly” by Maharashtra. Southern Bird Wing butterfly has been proposed to be declared as the “state butterfly” of Karnataka. Uttarakhand state government has proposed to declare the Common Peacock (Papilio bianor) is among the prettiest butterflies found in the foothills up to 2,100 meter in Himalayas.
